WaistLVKneelingTwist.name: Lever Kneeling Twist
WaistLVKneelingTwist.preparation: Adjust range of motion setting on machine to one side. Kneel on padded stool with both knees between leg pads. Place torso against upper pads and grasp handles.
WaistLVKneelingTwist.execution: Rotate lower body through waist to opposite side. Return and repeat. Adjust range of motion setting to opposite side and repeat in opposite direction.
WaistLVKneelingTwist.stabilizers: latissimusdorsi, pectoralisclavicular, tricepsbrachii, pectoralissternal, deltoidposterior, trapeziusmiddle, gluteusmaximus, deltoidanterior, trapeziuslower, pectoralisminor, rhomboids

WaistLVLyingTwist.name: Lever Lying Twist
WaistLVLyingTwist.preparation: Lie in machine with hands on handles, head on pad, partition between legs, and feet on foot bars. Disengage hand lever and rotate apparatus to one side until full spinal rotation is felt. Reengage hand lever.
WaistLVLyingTwist.execution: Rotate torso through waist to opposite side. Return and repeat. Readjust range of motion setting to opposite side and repeat in opposite direction.
WaistLVLyingTwist.comments: Greater surface area of torso resting padded lever supports significantly reduces involvement of upper body stablizing muscles as compared to Lever Seated Twist. See Spot Reduction Myth.

WaistLVSeatedSideBend.name: Lever Seated Side Bend
WaistLVSeatedSideBend.preparation: Position seat so shoulders are same height of padded lever. Sit in machine with legs to one side. Place over lever pad. Push padded lever down slightly until shoulder is fixed at approximately 90 upper arm parallel to floor.
WaistLVSeatedSideBend.execution: With hips stationary, push down lever by bending to side so elbow points downward. Return and repeat. Position lower body to opposite side and repeat.
WaistLVSeatedSideBend.comments: Maintain shoulder fixed at approximately 90 so upper arm and upper back are perpendicular. See Spot Reduction Myth.

WaistLVTwist.name: Lever Seated Twist
WaistLVTwist.preparation: Adjust range of motion setting on machine to one side. Sit with legs against padding. Place torso against pad and grasp handles.
WaistLVTwist.execution: Rotate torso through waist to opposite side. Return and repeat. Adjust range of motion setting to opposite side and repeat in opposite direction.
WaistLVTwist.stabilizers: latissimusdorsi, pectoralisclavicular, tricepsbrachii, pectoralissternal, deltoidposterior, trapeziusmiddle, deltoidanterior, trapeziuslower, adductors, pectoralisminor, rhomboids

WaistLVTwistLower.name: Lever Seated Twist
WaistLVTwistLower.preparation: Adjust range of motion setting on machine to one side. Sit with legs against padding. Place torso against pad and grasp handles.
WaistLVTwistLower.execution: Rotate lower body through waist to opposite side. Return and repeat. Adjust range of motion setting to opposite side and repeat in opposite direction.
WaistLVTwistLower.stabilizers: latissimusdorsi, pectoralisclavicular, tricepsbrachii, pectoralissternal, deltoidposterior, trapeziusmiddle, deltoidanterior, trapeziuslower, adductors, pectoralisminor, rhomboids

WaistLVTwistAltMach.name: Lever Seated Twist
WaistLVTwistAltMach.preparation: Adjust range of motion setting on arm levers to one side. Sit on seat with feet on platform. Position arms between pads and grasp handles above to each side.
WaistLVTwistAltMach.execution: Rotate torso through waist to opposite side. Return and repeat. Adjust range of motion setting to opposite side and repeat in opposite direction.
WaistLVTwistAltMach.stabilizers: hipexernalrotators, gluteusminimus, pectoralisclavicular, gluteusmaximus, gluteusmedius, pectoralissternal, deltoidanterior

WaistLVTwistGripless.name: Lever Seated Twist (gripless)
WaistLVTwistGripless.preparation: Adjust range of motion setting on seat to one side. Sit with legs straddled against padding. Wrap arms behind and under padded bars around each side.
WaistLVTwistGripless.execution: Rotate torso through waist to opposite side. Return and repeat. Adjust range of motion setting to opposite side and repeat in opposite direction.

WaistLVSideCrunch.name: Lever Seated Side Crunch
WaistLVSideCrunch.preparation: Position seat so shoulders are same height of padded lever. Sit on machine with legs angled to one side. Place arms over lever pad. Push padded lever down slightly until shoulders are are approximately 90 upper arm parallel to floor.
WaistLVSideCrunch.execution: With hips stationary, flex waist in C shape so elbows point downward. Return and repeat. Position lower body to opposite side and repeat.
WaistLVSideCrunch.comments: Maintain shoulders fixed at approximately 90 so upper arm and upper back are perpendicular. Men should keep chest close to padded lever. Women may choose to position chest as close as possible without making contact with inside of padded bar. See Spot Reduction Myth.

WaistLVStandingSideBend.name: Lever Standing Side Bend
WaistLVStandingSideBend.preparation: Stand with side to lever handle and grasp. Stand upright.
WaistLVStandingSideBend.execution: Bend waist to opposite side of lever. Lower weight by bending to opposite side and repeat. Continue with opposite side facing opposite direction.
WaistLVStandingSideBend.comments: Stand on platform if lever is too high to allow for full range of movement. See Spot Reduction Myth.
